helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hello Team,

I had booked a lab test package (78 tests) for 10:30–11:30 AM today.
The technician arrived at 11:34 AM, which is late. After collecting my
blood sample, he added an extra test fasting even though it is already
included in my package.

My original amount was ₹1554, but it was increased to ₹1663. The technician
told me to pay and said, “I will refund it,” but no refund has been
processed.

He also asked me to reschedule the test timing after blood collection, just
so he could enter details — this is not acceptable.

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Urgent: Wrong Billing & Refund Not Received for Lab Test
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hello Team,

I had booked a lab test package (78 tests) for 10:30–11:30 AM today.
The technician arrived at 11:34 AM, which is late. After collecting my blood sample, he added an extra test fasting even though it is already included in my package.

My original amount was ₹1554, but it was increased to ₹1663. The technician told me to pay and said, “I will refund it,” but no refund has been processed.

He also asked me to reschedule the test timing after blood collection, just so he could enter details — this is not acceptable.

Kindly initiate my full refund for the extra amount and take action against such practices.

Please check attached snapshots.

Registered Mobile: 7377412768
Order ID: 6244815

Thanks,
Dipak Kumar Khuntia

Regards,  Shruti Vaviya

notes.body: Hello Kavya,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     Please be informed, we are unable to comply with his request and erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, then we will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Kavya,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
Please be informed, we are unable to comply with his request and erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant Governmental authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.
 
Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, then we will go ahead and block the customer's account. 
 
Awaiting your response.
 
Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body:
Merged from ticket 22267484  
      Subject: REG: MY ORDER DATED 09 DEC 2025  
      Description:  Dear Sir  
   
 On 9th December we had ordered medicines and payment was also  
 made by Gpay.  
   
 It was intimated in system that it will 
 be delivered between 6 and 9 pm yesterday.  
   
 At 9 pm on checking the PharmEasy App l found the remark it has been delivered. We live in a gated apartment fully safe guarded by good security and very powerful Cameras. 
 On checking with security we found out there was no entry and Cameras  
 also confirmed no visitor came . 
   
 As we are old senior citizens it created 
 a panic in our minds. We managed to 
 call him .he said that he did not put that delivered remark and finally he delivered the shipment at 10.30 pm 
   
 Sir no problem at all if shipment delivered the next day. 
   
 Don't put such remark as delivered  
   
 This is a repetition of the same situation which happened to my order 
 of 29 July 2025. Refer my email of 
 30 July on the subject.  
   
 Nothing has changed . Same practice. Why it's done we dont understand. You have not succeeded in solving this problem  
   
 Perhaps the only solution in not to  
 Pay in advance . 
   
 Then he will definitely come and deliver as he has to collect money 
   
 Kindly do something  we are your earliest customers.  Today there are 
 other players in the market offering good services and good discounts. 
   
 Hope you guys streamline the system  
 for your sake. 
   
   
 With best regards  
   
 Mohan Chacko Verghese  
   
 8220720847 
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
   
 
   Yahoo Mail: Search, organise, conquer

notes.body:
Please reopen this ticket. It is not resolved. I am not satisfied with the reply which I quote below 
'" As per the update from our team, please be informed that pharmeasy always purchase the medicine from a genuine source. However required feedback has been shared with the team,
As checked the refund of Rs.411.46 /- was initiated on 12th December 2025 for the return of 1 quantity of SYSTANE ULTRA BOTTLE OF 10ML EYE DROPS . The refund will be credited to your payment source account within 5-7 business days. We appreciate your patience in the meantime" 
The refund might have taken place but my concern about the authenticity of the product has not been answered. Can you please answer the following queries
1. Has the manaufacturer ie Alcon changed the packing material/container ?  or did they change it for some period of time and what was supplied was the changed packing material/container ?2. Have you checked with Alcon if the contents in the bottle are as per their specifications ?

notes.body: Hello Naveen,     Greetings from PharmEasy!          With regards to your order #657389740622118912-76143, I see the requested medicine MUCAINE MINT FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 400ML ORAL GEL was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with MUCAINE MINT FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 200ML ORAL GEL as a packaging variant to fulfil your requirements.     I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.     I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.     I understand that you wish to modify the product. Please be informed that we are unable to modify the order once the order is placed. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.     I request you to place a new order with the required modifications.     Also, please note that this medicine MUCAINE MINT FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 200ML ORAL GEL comes with a 30-day return policy from the date of delivery. Therefore, once the medicine is delivered to you, you will be able to place a return request within the eligible return window.     I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Naveen,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #657389740622118912-76143, I see the requested medicine MUCAINE MINT FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 400ML ORAL GEL was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with MUCAINE MINT FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 200ML ORAL GEL as a packaging variant to fulfil your requirements.

I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.

I understand that you wish to modify the product. Please be informed that we are unable to modify the order once the order is placed. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

I request you to place a new order with the required modifications.

Also, please note that this medicine MUCAINE MINT FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 200ML ORAL GEL comes with a 30-day return policy from the date of delivery. Therefore, once the medicine is delivered to you, you will be able to place a return request within the eligible return window.

I appreciate your patience and understanding in this regard.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Pharmeasy,
your website is wonderful and you guys are providing Excellent service,
it's just one small thing I want you guys to stop. I am shopping from
pharmeasy from last 5/6 years, and always satisfied but the irritating
phone call I get just after placing the order every month is just too
disturbing. The executive forces me to buy things I don't need or want.
Kindly stop the phone calls on my number. This is my registered email id,
and my phone no. Is 9330746919.
                                                           Thanking you
                                                           Saptarshi Ray

-- 


Disclaimer:

This email contains proprietary, business-confidential, 
and/or privileged material. The information contained in this e-mail is 
intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. If 
you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any 
disclosure, copying, distribution or action in relation to the contents of 
this email is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful and request you to 
permanently delete this message and any attachments herein. You are 
requested to advise the sender, of your receipt of this email by return 
e-mail. The Company and its affiliates rule out any and every liability 
resulting from this or any other electronic transmission.

The intention of the call was to confirm the medicines ordered by you and to ensure that you receive the correct medicines on time.     I have highlighted the issue to the Operations team. We will respond with the update as soon as we receive any from them.     I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Regards,  Habiba

I hope you are doing well. I am writing to bring to your attention the delay in the delivery of my order. The shipment was expected to arrive on 6th December, but today is 10th December, and I have still not received it.
Here are the shipment details for your reference:
  • Tracking ID: BSRC0257049767
  • Order ID: PKFLKZP0361751

Thank you for your prompt attention. I look forward to a quick resolution.
Warm regards

notes.body: Hello,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern with regard to the order ID 599698735871668224 I will surely assist you with this.  ​   Please note that if we raise a return request for the LIVEASY BABY CARE SOFT & GENTLE BABY WIPES, then the refund amount will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. If you do not wish to get the refund in your PharmEasy wallet, then I request you to please set your refund preference.      Click on the link to set the refund preference: https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set your refund preference, either PharmEasy Wallet or the original payment source, you may contact us again, and we will take the necessary action accordingly.  ​   ​If I misunderstood your concern, I request that you elaborate on your concern so we will be able to assist you better.     Please be informed that we are unable to open the images that you have sent us. I would kindly request that you share the images in JPG or PDF format.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Vinoth,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities.      Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Vinoth,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities. 

Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello Suman,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      I am sorry to inform you that your order #657266550528970752-77985 was cancelled because the medicine that you added was unavailable with our partner retailer. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.     Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our partner retailer tried to source the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.     I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the partner retailer.     Please note that once your third shipment order is delivered, the refund will be initiated to your original payment source. You can expect to receive the refund within 3- 5 business days.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.       Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Suman,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I am sorry to inform you that your order #657266550528970752-77985 was cancelled because the medicine that you added was unavailable with our partner retailer. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.

Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our partner retailer tried to source the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the partner retailer.

Please note that once your third shipment order is delivered, the refund will be initiated to your original payment source. You can expect to receive the refund within 3- 5 business days.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

 Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

Dear PharmEasy Customer Support Team,
I am writing to request the immediate removal of all saved card details from my PharmEasy account due to security concerns regarding storing my card information on a third-party app. My registered mobile number is 9999032735 and email is surajghosh200117@gmail.com.
I have attempted to delete the saved cards directly from the app but am unable to do so. Please delete them from your end at the earliest to ensure my financial security.
Thank you for your prompt assistance. I look forward to your confirmation once this is completed.
Best regards,
Suraj Ghosh

Email: surajghosh200117@gmail.com

notes.body: Hello Suraj,      Greetings from PharmEasy!      This email is in regard to your concern raised with us. I will surely assist you.     I regret to inform you that our application currently does not have an option to delete or remove saved card details. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.     Please be assured that your feedback has been duly noted and will be shared with the relevant team for future improvements.     I have requested our Payment team to delete the card details from your PharmEasy profile. You can expect an update within 24 - 48 hours. As soon as we receive an update, we will notify you by email.     I appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Trishir,       Greetings from PharmEasy! notes.body: Hello Hemant,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities.      Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account.     Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Hemant,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities. 

Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account.

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
*[image: cid:image001.jpg@01DC5FCB.185DEA00]*

*C**apital **T**rainings **O**rganization **(R)*

*(Registered under Section 13 of the S. and Commercial Establishments
Act.1958)*

*(Management Consultants & Corporate Trainers)*



One Day Workshop  update

“A Practical Approach to Occupational Safety & Health Legal Issues,

Compliances, Recent Court Rulings & amendment 2025”

On Factories Act, 1948 & Bow Act, 1996

& E.P.F.Act.1952 & ESIC Act, 1948

*Day and Date: Saturday 27th December 2025*

*Venue: Hotel INDE Signature Tower, Plot No B-109 & 110, Near Unitech
Signature Towers,*

*South city-1, Sector 41 Gurgaon Haryana 122001*

*“Unfolding the Knowledge & Building Skills of People & Organizations”*

Dear Sir/Madam,

We are pleased to inform you that  Capital Trainings Organization announce
a one day Workshop on "A Practical Approach to Occupational Safety & Health
Legal Issues, Compliance, Recent Court Rulings & amendment 2025 “on
Factories Act,1948 & Bow Act 1996 & E.P.F.Act.1952 & ESIC Act
948  on  Saturday 27th December 2025  at the above venue Registration 9.30
AM TO 10.00 AM : Sessions :10.00 AM TO 6.00 PM.

*Background*

*The objective of the workshop is to facilitate executives responsible for
various legal compliances to discharge their responsibilities and
obligations under the Act, efficiently and confidently. The knowledge
sharing interactive workshops have been customized to update the concerned
executives and to understand the provisions of the Factories Act and Rules
EPF Act and Schemes, ESI Schemes, Statutory Compliance, etc. Moreover, the
Government of India has initiated various amendments to the EPF and the ESI
introducing procedural changes to the schemes to remove procedural
Impediments, cutting down cumbersome paperwork and introducing online
facilities. To strengthen understanding of the underlying provisions under
EPF and ESI and create awareness of various obligations under EPF and ESI,
This workshop will focus on providing updated knowledge relating to
implementation of EPF Scheme, Employees' Pension Scheme 1995 , ESI Scheme
and Factories Act and Rules with latest. case laws. It shall also focus on
problems that are being faced in day to day implementation and seek
remedial measures from the learned faculty.*

The thrust of the Workshop is aimed at problem solving through practical
solutions*.*

*Programme Contents*





Ø  Salient features of Factories Act, 1948 and Amendment 2025  & BOCW Act,
1996 Definitions, applicability, licensing, Registration; Duties of
Occupier, Powers of Inspectors, Procedure of adoption of

Ø  States Factory Rules under Factories Act 1948.Maintenance of various
Records / Registers.

Ø  Provisions of Safety of Workers at workplace, disposal of wastes and
affluent, Precaution against dangerous fumes, Pressure plants, Revolving
machinery;

Ø  Prevention against dangerous forms, power of inspectors, appointment of
safety officers.

Ø  Disaster Management, Control of industrial major accidents / hazards at
workplace, provisions relating to hazardous processes, provisions relating
to welfare of workers, canteen, rest room, crèches, appointment of welfare
officers, provisions relating to first aid, medical facilities, etc.;
latest case laws.

Ø  Occupational Safety & health of workers at workplace –
Employer Responsibilities. Different provisions as applicable to the
Contract Labour (R &A) Act,

Ø  Important Judgments relating to the Act.

Ø  Salient provisions of ESIC Act, 1948 and EPF Act, 1952

Ø   Occupational Safety, Health and Working Conditions (OSH) Code, 2020
<https://urldefense.com/v3/__https://www.google.com/search?q=Occupational*Safety*2C*Health*and*Working*Conditions**A28OSH*29*Code*2C*2020&oq=factory*act*new*code&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOTIHCAEQIRigATIHCAIQIRigATIHCAMQIRigATIHCAQQIRiPAtIBCjIyNTU2ajBqMTWoAgiwAgHxBWBeMn28kVpL8QVgXjJ9vJFaSw&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8&sei=jP4qacOQEo2QseMP7bjTgQw&mstk=AUtExfDyuqPXEmHVifk16Ak2IIvUaziMGygCFy9CUr8Z-05WqctKNpM8ATXB_JZ4-X5rc3i6AsHi6n5LDtgukAe_JFiTmbJidMeOMTz0kxcCccOTNV4f_3V9bHKBqxlsXT5jif4&csui=3&ved=2ahUKEwj3jonVxJeRAxVuSWwGHY7jGqgQgK4QegQIARAB__;KyUrKysrKyUlKyUrKysr!!PUkdKKdW7rI!bercrdSuZZEtl3JO8-hDOKDjcsM3gK4scVNrzH6Ucru5CLrdw8QtYUqiuodgINwYAgOWVAOHgFyZMY65k7LQHXZqD20$ >




*Faculty:* *Knowledge is Treasure but Practice is the Key to its”*

Mr. V.K. Sharma, is a M. Tech (Industrial Engineering) in Indian Institute
of Technology Delhi. and B.E. (Electrical Engineering) from Indian
Institute of Science, Bangalore and securing First Division and ninth rank
in order of merit. He has rich experience of over 3 decades and shall
provide practical solutions to the problems faced by the Units. He has
conducted many in-house as well as open training programs and workshops on
Factories Act and Rules, Industrial Safety, Mining, Occupational Safety and
Health for corporate executives, government officials and school teachers.
He developed a major accident hazards control system for Delhi Government
for major hazards units besides conducting training programmers for
management of major hazards installations. He worked for the adoption of
CIMAH Rules for updating factory rules. He is also visiting faculty for
Centre for Occupational Health, Environmental Health and Gandhi Labour
Foundation, Odessa, Employer Organizations, and Regional Labour Institutes.

*Mr. Manoj Srivastava, a very Senior Faculty having in -depth knowledge in
Personnel Management & Industrial Relations. He has over 25 years of
experience in the corporate world including Aditya Birla Group. He has
conducted several programs / Seminars on EPF, ESI , Labour Laws, Industrial
Relations, Disciplinary Action, latest Court judgments on Labour Laws etc.*

*Who will benefit?*

*The Workshop is specially designed for Managers and Executives from
Private Sectors / Multinational Companies / PSUs and other establishments
who are responsible for the implementation of these Acts / schemes at the
corporate and unit level.*

 *Participation fee**:*  *(Inclusive of GST)*

Ø  Rs.6000/-  per delegate

Ø  Rs.5500/- for Members  & Female Delegates

Ø  Early bird rebate Rs.500/-per delegate if received along with payment by

Ø  Saturday 20th December  2025

Ø  (Additional 10% rebate for Nominations of 3 & above from   the    same
Organization

    *Certificates can be provided to participants as per the request after
the workshop*

   *Cheque to be made in favour of “Capital Training”*



The Participation fee includes study material, refreshment, lunch and other
organizational expenses. Those interested to join the membership of the
Group & looking for in-house training may kindly contact us.

Your nominations (form enclosed) should reach us at the earliest but not
later than Friday 26th December 2025. However, advance nomination should be
sent to us by email/fax so that the seats (s) are reserved for your
participants (s).It is a pleasure to be of service.

 With kind regards,

 Yours sincerely,

(SEEMA SHARMA)

Program Coordinatorc

MOB.9873287726

E-mail: *services*@capitaltrainings.org <contact@capitaltrainings.org>,
contact.capitaltraining@gmail.com,

https://urldefense.com/v3/__http://capitaltrainings.org__;!!PUkdKKdW7rI!bercrdSuZZEtl3JO8-hDOKDjcsM3gK4scVNrzH6Ucru5CLrdw8QtYUqiuodgINwYAgOWVAOHgFyZMY65k7LQyX3C6mI$  (site under maintenance)

Capital Trainings  Organisation (R)

Registered  Office: 428-B, Vashist  Complex, Sikanderpur M.G. Road  Gurgaon
-122002, Haryana India

Head Office: G-143, Phase-6,Aya Nagar, New Delhi 110047

***********************

--

you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any

Respected Sir/ MadamI had ordered medicines on 05.12.25 & had paid for the same Medicines were supposed to be delivered the next day But instead got a message saying unless another INR 109 are not paid there will be delay in delivery of the medicines We order medicines on a week end just to make sure there is someone at home during the arrival of medicines which didn’t happen Late night calls ( at 10.30pm ) by pharmacist for verification is annoying Despite several feedback’s regarding the same same problem gets repeated Today the medications were just left at the door when the delivery person called I was at work & couldn’t take the call immediately but I called back & told the delivery person to leave the medications with the security but he was very rude & refused to do the same I told him that he will be responsible if medicines are lost We have lost the medicines in the past 
I request you to kindly look into the above issues & give a solution Thank you 

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPad

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Respected Sir/ Madam
I had ordered medicines on 05.12.25 & had paid for the same Medicines were supposed to be delivered the next day But instead got a message saying unless another INR 109 are not paid there will be delay in delivery of the medicines 
We order medicines on a week end just to make sure there is someone at home during the arrival of medicines which didn’t happen 
Late night calls ( at 10.30pm ) by pharmacist for verification is annoying Despite several feedback’s regarding the same same problem gets repeated 
Today the medications were just left at the door when the delivery person called I was at work & couldn’t take the call immediately but I called back & told the delivery person to leave the medications with the security but he was very rude & refused to do the same I told him that he will be responsible if medicines are lost 
We have lost the medicines in the past 

I request you to kindly look into the above issues & give a solution 
Thank you 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPad

notes.body: Hello Anushri,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I tried to reach you earlier today at 12:15 PM on 8373928806, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.      With regard to your order #657206728815050752-76730, I would like to inform you that the product EVERHERB (BY PHARMEASY) PAIN RELIEF OIL - BLEND OF 8 POWERFUL HERBAL INGREDIENTS - 100 ML was added to your cart by you before proceeding with the order. We have not added this item to your order from our end.      I also see that the requested medicines THIONOXIDE 4MG STRIP OF 10 CAPSULES and GEN D3 60K STRIP OF 8 SOFTGEL CAPSULES were unavailable with our partner retailer.      Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source.     However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.     I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.     I would request you reconsider your decision regarding the cancellation of your order.     Please be informed we are unable to cancel an order once it is dispatched for delivery. If you still wish to cancel your order, you may refuse it at the time of delivery.       If you still wish to cancel your order kindly get back to us we will check and assist you further.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Anushri,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I tried to reach you earlier today at 12:15 PM on 8373928806, but unfortunately, I was unable to connect with you.

With regard to your order #657206728815050752-76730, I would like to inform you that the product EVERHERB (BY PHARMEASY) PAIN RELIEF OIL - BLEND OF 8 POWERFUL HERBAL INGREDIENTS - 100 ML was added to your cart by you before proceeding with the order. We have not added this item to your order from our end. 

I also see that the requested medicines THIONOXIDE 4MG STRIP OF 10 CAPSULES and GEN D3 60K STRIP OF 8 SOFTGEL CAPSULES were unavailable with our partner retailer. 

Please note, at the time of placing the order, the requested medicine was available in limited quantity, and you were able to add medicines to the order. Once the medicine was added to your order, our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source.

However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfil your medicine requirements for this order completely.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.

I would request you reconsider your decision regarding the cancellation of your order.

Please be informed we are unable to cancel an order once it is dispatched for delivery. If you still wish to cancel your order, you may refuse it at the time of delivery.  

If you still wish to cancel your order kindly get back to us we will check and assist you further.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Tahera
